posts.title: Setting up Actix Web in a Tauri App
posts.description: In this article, we will discuss how to set up an Actix web server with a Tauri application.
posts.keywords: Tauri, Rust, Desktop apps, Actix, RESTful API

posts.title: How to monitor hardware variables in PHP
posts.description: How to monitor hardware variables like cpu load, memory usage, disk usage and disk total with PHP.

posts.title: Using a local php package in your projects
posts.description: I discuss my experience with learning how to create PHP packages and my concerns about testing packages locally and contributing to open source packages.
